title: Taliban issue no-shave order to barbers in Afghan province
content:
1. Taliban issue no-shave order to barbers in Afghan province  Associated Press
  2. The Taliban banned barbers from cutting beards in part of Afghanistan, saying it is against Islam  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Afghanistan: Taliban ban Helmand barbers from trimming beards  BBC News
  4. Barbers in Afghanistan's Helmand Province are now prohibited from shaving beards and playing music  CNN
  5. Taliban warn barbers in one province not to trim beards, report says  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

Taliban warn barbers in one province not to trim beards, report says  Fox News

localize.title: タリバン、アフガン州の理髪店に剃毛禁止命令を出す
塔利班向阿富汗各省的理发师发出禁止剃须的命令
